text: Made my daughter and me sick.  I called to talk to a manager to inform them something was wrong, no call back.  We were not seeking anything just giving them a heads up (we are both former restaurant workers).  Just a heads up, avoid this place.

name: David Shull
text: Miss the buffets during Lunch time. But you do a fantastic lunch buffet at this location. The hostess/waitresses and other staff have been very good and great personalities. They make a good side salad & will keep your cup full. Everything is pleasant.

text: It might be slamming it might be not so slamming. P'zone and wings are delicious. Small regular wings though, we get boneless.

text: I ordered tonight (March 12th) food came fast, it was hot and it was great tasted like the old recipe which I loved! They threw in some ranch cups. Whomever answered the phone sounded happy to work there, I could hear him clearly and he was …More

name: B Cull
text: Online ordered to get 2 item lrg for 7.99, ordered 5 for Birthday Party. Pizza was Hot, Fresh, and toppings plentiful!! RESTURAUNT  WAS CLEAN!! STAFF FRIENDLY, WILL RETURN. Only purchase with online specials for best deals, I called to verify they received order, All is well at THE HUT:)

name: Dave Miller
text: The big dinner box isn't worth your money. The pizzas were nasty and the breadsticks were hard. The pasta was OK but nothing i would get out of bed for.

text: The manager was very nice and knows the menu. But the cashier didn't greet me or any of customers that came in. She was not knowledgeable about the menu.

text: Good service. Pick-up window which I love!! And the order has been right the last 3 times I've ordered from there!! And those have been the only times so far. Hopefully it stays that way!!

text: I called in and ordered 2 p'zones last week when they came out, one was pepperoni and one was a plain cheese. I call in today to order only to be told they can't make a cheese p'zone? I ordered one last week on the $5 dollar line up so I'll …More

name: Ryan Smith
text: Very poor quality pizza that's left me disappointed each time I've had it. Pizzahut is to expensive and has way to much competition to charge what they do for their pizzas. It's always greasy and usually cold by the time I get it. There are better places to get pizza in Marion to put up with the BS here. Try tubbys instead.

text: Pizza was good nothing above and beyond. My fiancee was having a baby at marion hospital. Wanted to get her what ever she wanted and her go to was pizza hut. We live in bucyrus ohio and eat there often but prefer the galion ohio pizza hut …More

name: Jennifer Shipman
text: Their pizza is disgusting . I'd rather eat little ceasers for $5 then pay $14.99 for a 1 topping. The dough wasn't cooked all the way the ingredients were cheap and fake tasting. Also tasted like they add sugar to the sauce. It was the …More

name: Jason Scott
text: They sell a pasta and cant even put enough cheese on it to cover the top. Then when you ask for extra cheese your told that you cant because they dont know how to charge you for extra cheese..smh ummm as a suggestion how about the same way you charge for the pizza.
